com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core
Class TransitionRollbackException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core.FiniteStateException
              com.continuent.tungsten.fsm.core.TransitionRollbackException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class TransitionRollbackException
extends FiniteStateException

Denotes a failed transition that can be rolled back to the previous state. Actions may throw this exception to indicate that there are no side effects and the state change may safely be rolled back. Any error handling is fully encapsulated within the action and is complete at the time this exception is thrown.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Hodges
See Also:
